name: Chunk World
description:
This is a survival game, kinda ^^ You chopp down wood to build your dream house. Thats all.. Alot I know :P

this game was made in 25 hours for the Ludum Dare compo event.

---Key bindings---

wasd = move around

mouse = look around

e = inventory / crafting menu

alt = build mode

------------------

There is something called buildingMode and that is the state your character is in when your building.

It makes you see where your walls/doors/windows will be placed. The indicator that says if your in building mode or not is your cursor. if it is using default colors it will be pink/purple when your not in BuildingMode but when you are its orange.

---Good things to know---

-Only because this is a ludum dare version i made it so everyone starts of with 1 wall, 1 door frame and 1 window frame.

So you can get a hang of the building. You can ofc still cut down some trees to make more walls etc.

-Customizable crosshair colors to distinguish from when your in BuildingMode or not.

-I will be updating the game over at gameJolt under the judging period.

Ofc with a new link. Comming soon ^^

-To free your mouse and lock movment press Esc.

-If you select an item from the inventory you will automatically be in BuildingMode.

-HAvE FuN. ^^
